channel.title: Amusing moments in games
channel.description:
In Half-life 2, a combine soldier sprinted at me, with live grenade behind him. Fatally beaned him with another live grenade.:|
Anyone have something better to share?

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: Raziel_ZV
item.description:
In Quake 4…one of soldiers: “Let me be the first one to tell you that you look like a shit…”

Read full topic

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: Lost_one
item.description:
Hmm… World of Warcraft…twilight Highlands horde side. When trying to convince the leader to join the horde the ambassador failed going “This is madness!” And the leader responded “Madness? This…is…DRAGONMAW!” And proceeded to kick the ambassador into the fire.

Read full topic

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
In GTAVC while doing the bank heist: I was impatient, so I sprinted to the vault and Tommy stopped right in front of it instead of off to the side…

gta_VC2.jpg742×557 72.4 KB

Read full topic

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: SkyBlue
item.description:
This one gets me every time in HL2: Episode 1, where Dr Kleiner is talking on the public broadcast about how the anti-reproductive field has been shut down, and in the safehouse one of the survivors asks “Is he… well, you know… telling us to get jiggy with it?” (or words to that effect)

Read full topic

item.description:
another stupid AI moment I experienced in Crysis 2, I tossed a Grenade at a couple of Ceph troops I was trying to kill, and one of the stupid fuckers walks over it as it detonates instead of running away from it like they normally would.

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
I don’t know why but in ME1 when you would walk up and talk to Wrex and he’d say “Shepard”, I got great ammusment out of just ending the comment so that I’d reply “Wrex” and continue to do this.
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex
Shepard
Wrex

Read full topic

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
When the Ebon Hawk got captured by the Sith in KOTOR, and I decided that Mission should be the one to break everyone out of lockup.
This had me laughing pretty hard:

[b]Sith soldier 1:[/b] "We found a young Twi'lek in the back. She's got quite the mouth on her! She swore at me and spit on my uniform." 
[b]Sith soldier 2:[/b] "She tried to bite me through my armor! And you should hear what she said about my mother!"

Read full topic

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
I did laugh like an idiot for like 10 minutes in ME2, during the final battle on Horizon. I had Garrus on my team and we were fighting courageously those damn ugly guys, and Garrus prepped his concussive shot… Or tried to - all I heard was “CONCUSSIVE SHAAAAARRRGGHHH!”, and he died. Didn’t even get to finish announcing his concussive shot, the poor guy.
I hadn’t laughed so much in a long time. I am a terrible person.

Read full topic

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
This happened in Oblivion a while ago. Couldn’t talk to him or anything.

Then again, I wouldn’t want anyone talking to me while taking a floating dump in my armor.

Read full topic

item.title: Amusing moments in games
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
Crysis 2, 2 C.E.L.L. troops are in the elevator in “lab Rat” pretty much every time I came across these idiots I headshotted them both with the same round (they lined up to exit the elevator so I took the opportunity to cloak-shoot them both with the silenced pistol using a laser sight)

Read full topic
